text: Murphy's War is a 1971 World War II drama movie. It was directed by Peter Yates. It was and based on the 1969 novel of the same name by Max Catto. It stars Peter O'Toole, Si√¢n Phillips, Philippe Noiret, Horst Janson, John Hallam and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1971 war movies Category:1971 drama movies Category:British war movies Category:British drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Venezuela
title: Murphy's War
